comment: BISA LEWIS was too strict. Her assingments were clear as were her deadlines and instructions however she really had her favorites and she seemed to only care about how much money her jobs pay her. She's friendly in class but not in person. Glad she's gone!
Fun class, but must attend. Lots of group projects but no tests. If you do the work she requires its an A.
Great prof. Attendance is mandatory but a lot of things are covered in class, so   to learn gotta be there. If you do the work and show up to class, its an A. Just follow her instructions.

ATTENDANCE MANDATORY! If you miss 2 days, your grade is dropped an entire letter.  If you miss 4 days, you will fail the class. She teaches her own curriculum that she wrote the textbook for. I emailed her a question & her reply was we'll discuss in class.  Problem was it was a hybrid class so we wouldn't meet for almost 2 weeks.

Her class is her pushing her own curriculum.  Did not learn much about the other curriculum's in the field.  She is unapproachable and is not helpful with questions, and can be quite rude when asked one. ATTENDANCE IS MANDATORY or she will drop you a letter grade!  She rarely responds to emails. I strongly recommend not taking her class, AVOID.

I agree that this professor is extremely rude and abrasive.  She does not respond to e-mails in a timely manner (I had to wait 2 weeks for a response), however her time is valuable and she will not answer ANY questions without an appointment.  Her teaching does nothing to prepare you for lesson planning.  A waste of money and time.
Horrible, horrible teacher. She's rude, inconsiderate, and arrogant. By far the worst ECE teacher I?ve had here at Kennesaw.

She is an intersting teacher. She sticks to her syllabus. Attendance is mandatory if you want to pass. Lots of projects, which is part of the course, but they are group projects. Sometimes unclear about her expectations. All in all she is a good teacher. I would take her again.
